data: It happened that, on the morning of the momentous June the fourteenth when the discovery of the murdered body of Alvin H. Benson created a sensation which, to this day, has not entirely died away, I had breakfasted with Philo Vance in his apartment.
Van Dine, S. S., 1888-1939; Stoops, Herbert Morton, 1887-1948 [Illustrator]
